work.summary: ShipMatrix is a business intelligence and reporting platform that leverages industry knowledge to better shipping practices of large scale shipping operations.
highlights: Created and launched http://www.EasyTrackApp.com the application's brochure site.
Developed several new desktop applications, providing software specifications and testing analysis.
Created dynamic SQL queries to consistently update based on currently non processed files across 20+ vm's and 100+ databases hosted on 2 different servers.
Updated the main reporting site's look and feel as well as brought CSS1 up to current CSS3 standards.
Developed a communcations tool that downloads directly from both fedex.com and ups.com.
Gained a lot of knowledge about mobile apps, SQL Server, and desktop applications running in virtual environments.

work.summary: RedZone Robotics was a CMU grad staffed asset reporting system.  Staffed primarily by brilliant young CMU graduates RedZone Robotics serviced municipal waste lines through robotic data collection of television, laser, gas, and IMU data.
highlights: Created an entire company overhead view of the processes mapped to a flowchart that the company still has in use today.
Independently responsible for training and integration of new data processing methods into the Responder platform.
Managed data alignment using custom software and reporting back to software for bugs and enhancement requests personally and using freshdesk ticketing system.
Manually updated fields in Microsoft access using individual find and replaces or SQL update statements.
Updated company computer's hardware and software as needed.
Never missed a deadline even with the most complicated data.  Helped to remove 20+ accoutns from being 'in the red' per the company's requirements.

volunteer.summary: Helped a friend out by creating a simple BootStrap layout DJ site where he can showcase his works using the embedded SoundCloud API
highlights: SoundCloud API and dynamic layouts (mobile and desktop)
